long_description: Keep the Carson MagniLook(TM) Pendant Magnifier hanging around your neck and you'll always be able to find it when you need to read a menu or take a close look at a map. 3x power crystal-clear acrylic lens makes it easy to read small type on menus and maps; a small 6x power spot lens within the 3x lens enlarges the tiniest text. Includes a soft pouch and neck strap. Closeout.
short_description: Keep the Carson MagniLook(TM) Pendant Magnifier hanging around your neck and you'll always be able to find it when you need to read a menu or take a close look at a map.
